lead_paragraph: Controversial hooker Dylan Hartley was named England's new captain by coach Eddie Jones on Monday, replacing Chris Robshaw despite the Northampton firebrand having a long history of ill-discipline.

headline.print_headline: Bad-Boy Hartley Replaces Robshaw as England Captain
headline.main: Bad-Boy Hartley Replaces Robshaw as England Captain

snippet: Controversial hooker Dylan Hartley was named England's new captain by coach Eddie Jones on Monday, replacing Chris Robshaw despite the Northampton firebrand having a long history of ill-discipline....
